entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning near midnight. Local blowing snow before morning. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow ending near noon then cloudy. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming east 30 gusting to 50 in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 05 March 2023
